briefTitle: An Open-label, Long-term Safety Study of Linaclotide in Patients With Chronic Constipation or Irritable Bowel Syndrome With Constipation
officialTitle: An Open-label, Long-term Safety Study of Oral Linaclotide Administered to Patients With Chronic Constipation or Irritable Bowel Syndrome With Constipation
summary: The objective of this study is to assess the long-term safety of linaclotide administered to patients with chronic constipation (CC) or irritable bowel syndrome with constipation (IBS-C).

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With at Least One Treatment-Emergent Adverse Event (TEAE)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From first dose of open-label study drug up to 78 weeks
